title: Alfredo de Sarachaga
text:
Alfredo de Sarachaga, "was" an accomplished businessman in the <a href="Petrochemical">Petrochemical</a> Industry. He was a Mexican diplomat, and for over 20 years was Pemex's New York financial director, <a href="de%20facto">de facto</a>, <a href="CEO">CEO</a> <a href="Pemex">Pemex</a> America.
Alfredo de Sarachaga was born a Mexican of <a href="Basque%20Country%20%28autonomous%20community%29">basque</a> descent, heir of Alexis de Sarachaga and son of Ricardo de Sarachaga and Maria Luisa Carrouche, both of <a href="Bilbao">Bilbao</a>.
He married Lidia Garcia de Leon y Avellaneda. His wife was the <a href="maternal%20aunt">maternal aunt</a> of <a href="Dionisio%20Meade%20y%20Garcia%20de%20Leon">Dionisio Meade y Garcia de Leon</a>, father of Jose Antonio Meade, all part of the prominent Mexican political family <a href="Garcia%20de%20Leon%20family%20of%20Mexico">Garcia de Leon family of Mexico</a>. The couple had several children, three of them being daughters.
